caption.p: Effect of CCM on sperm function, serum testosterone, and penile nitric oxide synthase activity after 3-week administration. ( a) Sperm concentration in epididymis and vas deference. ( b) Percentage of total sperm motility in epididymis and vas deference. Values represent mean ± SD( N = 10/group ).∗ P < 0.05 compared with the normal control group, and # P < 0.05 compared with the DM control group.
